price: 31 N’ont-ils pas appris combien Nous avons anéanti avant eux de nations qu’ils ne verront plus jamais réapparaître
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alam yaraw kam ahlaknā qablahum mina al-qurūni annahum ilayhim lā yarjiʿūna
